entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening and ending before morning then partly cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 March 2023
